thread.title: Wave of Anti-Trump Protests Is ‘Balancing Act’ for Police
thread.title_full: Wave of Anti-Trump Protests Is ‘Balancing Act’ for Police - WSJ

author: Beth Reinhard
title: Wave of Anti-Trump Protests Is ‘Balancing Act’ for Police
text:
It can start with a late-night text or early-morning tweet following the latest action by the Trump administration. And before long, hundreds if not thousands of protesters are gathering.

Since Donald Trump became president, Americans are taking to the streets in protest more frequently and in bigger numbers than many communities have seen in decades, and often with little warning. That has put pressure on law enforcement to keep the...
